‚ö†Ô∏è **Please do NOT disclose security-related issues publicly.**

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly by sending an email to:

**hoangduyhunglc@gmail.com**

Include the following details:
- A clear description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce (if possible)
- Potential impact
- Any suggested fixes (optional)

We appreciate your responsible disclosure and will respond as soon as possible.
